CARTOLEX_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the Cartolex backend API server, see the endpoint server module for more details

FLASK_SECRET_USER_APP.description: Flask secret key for user app, internal use for CSRF protection

CORS_ORIGINS_USER_APP.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins for cross-origin requests

RATELIMIT_DEFAULT_USER_APP.description: Default rate limit using Flask-Limiter syntax (e.g., '1000 per hour')
